title: My game crashes every game but I am able to load back in right away
body: My game closes and goes to client with the reconnect button and I can reconnect but this happens every game usually once at random times sometimes in base sometimes when tower diving also usually happens pre 25 mins in game.

replies.body: You might have outdated drivers or something else that's failing to initially render the game.  The [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide should have the steps to help troubleshoot this crash.  It's important to get this fixed up asap so you don't leave your teammates behind.  Let me know if you have any questions.

Hi Its been awhile but I have tried everything on the game crash list and I do not know what the issue is it still happens every game any ideas on how to fix it? I have tried reinstalling, repairing, updating cards and it still crashes only thing I can think of is something is running in the backround causing it to crash but I do not know what that could be.

Thanks for trying all that out, and it sucks that the issue is still happening.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can help out individually.  Download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) as well to attach some logs to your ticket.  We'll reply back asap!
